author: @News Desk
title: Pakistan facing critical challenge of sending 26.21m children back to school, moot told
text: Pakistan faces a critical challenge with approximately 26.21 million out-of-school children (OOSC). In response to this crisis, the Sindh Education Foundation (SEF), in collaboration with Catholic Relief Services (CRS) and Japan International Cooperation Agency (JICA), organised a two-day National Conference for Education Foundations at Karachi. The conference aimed to foster collaboration and knowledge- sharing among education foundations across Pakistan. The foundations participating in the conference identified key challenges within the education sector, share best practices, and explore innovative approaches to enhance support for education sector more effectively. A ‘Foundations’ Action Plan’ developed to address the needs of out-of-school children by way of evolving a synergy amongst the education foundations to amplify collective impact and facilitate mutual learning. In the opening remarks, Managing Director SEF Abdul Kabir Kazi emphasized the collaborative effort to educate every child. He acknowledged that all stakeholders are striving to retain out-of-school children. However, the primary purpose of this conference is to develop an action plan as Sindh Chief Minister Syed Murad Ali Shah wants to seriously respond to the education emergency declared by the prime minister. Then, Abid Gill provided an overview around JICA’s efforts in response to the out-of-school-children issues in Pakistan. He added that JICA’s AQAL project has developed ALPs for primary and middle-tech as well as literacy & skill programmes to teach youth and adults. He shared that these learning models are synching extremely well to build a stronger educational ecosystem in the country. Chairman Planning and Development Department, GoS, Najam Shah lauded the efforts of the conference organizers for establishing a consortium of education foundations to respond to the educational emergency in the country. The momentum of the conference was driven by representatives from the Elementary and Secondary Education Foundation (ESEF)-KP, Punjab Education Foundation (PEF), Merged Areas Education Foundation (MaEF), Balochistan Education Foundation (BEF), National Education Foundation (NEF), and the SEF. These representatives presented existing educational models that education foundations are employing to include, retain and teach out-of-school children. They added that prevailing challenges of budgetary constraints, geographical dynamics, and political instabilities are among the major bottlenecks towards addressing the out-of-school crises. The discussion provided valuable insights into governance models, policy priorities, access issues, quality & relevance, accountability, and the monitoring & research frameworks of these education foundations. The conference agenda was made more effective through interactive discussions with panellists, who addressed a wide range of issues, including teacher retention, resource allocation, school infrastructure, poverty, lack of coordination between partners and foundations, and shortages of books and other educational resources. Minister for Education Gilgit-Baltistan Ghulam Shehzad Agha commended the role of the SEF in inspiring regional foundations to work towards a common goal. He said that he will establish an education foundation in GB using the SEF model. Renowned economist and educationist Kaiser Bengali stated that while individual parents are eager to send their children to school; however, communities often fail to make the necessary efforts to ensure access to education through their elected representatives. He added Karachi’s Orangi Town presents notably high literacy because the community has taken ownership of the issue. He pointed out that no member of the provincial assembly (MPA) or member of the national assembly (MNA) has ever lost their constituency for failing to secure the right to education. Bengali further criticised the state’s failure to provide education, attributing it to several factors, including the politicisation of teacher recruitment. He explained that teacher appointments are often influenced by political considerations, with the aim of gaining electoral support. “I have proposed to the government that teachers should not be engaged in election duties,” he added. author: Ryan Naumann Us Weekly Spanish
title: Zak Bagans habla sobre la muerte del investigador Dan Rivera, Annabelle
text:
Us Weekly
Zak Bagans habla sobre la muerte del investigador Dan Rivera, Annabelle
Ghost AdventuresZak Bagans habló con Us sobre su experiencia con Annabelle, días después de que el también investigador paranormal Dan Rivera falleciera en presencia de la muñeca embrujada.
"Mis pensamientos y oraciones están con su familia y amigos", dijo Bagans a Us en una entrevista el miércoles 16 de julio.
Bagans, quien tuvo su propia experiencia con la muñeca en 2017, dijo a Us: "Solo puedo hablar de mis experiencias con Annabelle".
Explicó: "Tuve la oportunidad de investigar a Annabelle cuando el propietario la trajo a mi museo en 2017".
"Me afectó mucho y eso hizo que tocara la muñeca. Al dueño no le gustó nada", relató.
Bagans contó a Us sobre un aterrador encuentro en febrero con otra muñeca, que lo dejó asustado y luchando por su vida.
Explicó: "Fue una infestación demoníaca que me afectó gravemente y, literalmente, estuve en el hospital al día siguiente. Fue un apego que duró dos meses y una de las peores experiencias de mi vida".
Dijo a Us que la "horrible" experiencia que se extendió durante meses lo llevó a tomarse un descanso de las investigaciones paranormales sobre demonios. "Esto demuestra que, como alguien que se dedica a este trabajo, las muñecas pueden ser portadoras de posesión y apego demoníaco", señaló y añadió: "¿Creo que las muñecas pueden ser portadoras de demonios? Absolutamente. ¿Siento que pueden afectar a las personas? Sí, lo creo".
El 13 de julio, Rivera falleció durante la gira Devils on the Run en Gettysburg, Pensilvania, donde se exhibía la muñeca Annabelle, supuestamente embrujada.
La policía confirmó que respondió a una llamada en el hotel donde se realizaba el tour tras recibir el reporte de la muerte de un hombre.
"El fallecido fue encontrado en su habitación de hotel por trabajadores", informó la policía. "No se observó nada inusual ni sospechoso en el lugar".
Según Francis Dutrow, forense del condado de Adams, la autopsia de Rivera ya fue completada. La causa de la muerte se ha pospuesto a la espera de los resultados toxicológicos, que podrían demorar entre ocho y diez semanas.
La Sociedad de Nueva Inglaterra para la Investigación Psíquica señaló que planea continuar con la gira programada por Estados Unidos a pesar del fallecimiento de Rivera.
Annabelle ha sido descrita como "poseída por demonios". Según People, la Sociedad de Nueva Inglaterra para la Investigación Psíquica, donde trabajaba Rivera y que fue fundada por los reconocidos investigadores paranormales Ed y Lorraine Warren, afirma que la historia de la muñeca se remonta a 1968.
Una mujer recibió la muñeca, cuya versión ficticia aparece en la saga cinematográfica El Conjuro. Después de que sus compañeras de piso afirmaran haber notado cosas extrañas, una médium les indicó que la muñeca estaba poseída por el espíritu de una niña llamada Annabelle.
Ed y Lorraine se llevaron la muñeca de la casa de la mujer y la mantuvieron bajo llave durante años. Posteriormente, la familia Warren la exhibió en su museo y, en ocasiones, la prestaba para giras como la que realizaba Rivera al momento de su muerte.
Copyright 2025 Us Weekly. All rights reserved
Esta historia fue publicada originalmente el 16 de julio de 2025, 6:59 p. m..

author: Brian Williams, Local Journalism Initiative Reporter London Free Press
title: Inside Volkwagen's hiring push for its $7B electric-vehicle battery plant
text:
PowerCo, a subsidiary of Volkswagen, launched a hiring campaign Wednesday to begin recruiting thousands of workers for its $7-billion electric vehicle battery plant in St. Thomas. Here are some things to know.
PowerCo is gearing up to hire for “hundreds of high-quality local jobs,” the company said in a statement, noting it has already doubled its workforce to 200 employees so far this year and aims to a fill a range of positions by year end.
An eclectic list of jobs are available to applicants and some of the immediate open positions are building construction leads, IT professionals and engineers as well as sustainability experts.
ARTICLE CONTINUES BELOW “As (PowerCo) grows from 200 to hundreds more people, it’s really the next step towards the huge ramp-up that’s going to happen as we get closer to initial production,” said Sean Dyke, chief executive of the St. Thomas Economic Development Corporation.
Applicants can find employment opportunities on PowerCo’s website and submit applications for multiple job openings.
Jake Roseman, speaking on behalf of PowerCo, said job listings are open for applications on the company’s website and jobseekers should expect more postings.
“We have already listed dozens of job openings on our website, and we are looking to fill hundreds more this year,” Roseman said in an email statement.
The PowerCo statement said that recruitment efforts would be ramped up in the months ahead through multiple channels, including an advertising blitz on billboards from St. Thomas to London.
The plant is expected to employ several thousand employees once fully operational.
ARTICLE CONTINUES BELOW ARTICLE CONTINUES BELOW In its statement, PowerCo reiterated the electric vehicle battery plant is on pace to open in 2027.
Although there’s been activity on the site in northeast St. Thomas, PowerCo said the factory would break ground “in the coming weeks.”
Dyke said the opening of the factory is key to creating employment opportunities beyond the electric vehicle battery and automotive industries.
“Spin-offs can range far and wide, right from direct suppliers to indirect and then, of course, all the way down to restaurants and dry cleaners,” Dyke said.
“We’re really excited about what’s going to happen here in the future. And I think the future is getting a lot closer, just with announcements like this one . . . From our perspective as a municipality, I think it’s important for people to know that St. Thomas is a great place to work and to live.”
St. Thomas Mayor Joe Preston called PowerCo’s hiring push “incredible” for the city, noting the company is a part of a “great industry.”
ARTICLE CONTINUES BELOW ARTICLE CONTINUES BELOW Preston said he hasn’t doubted the electric vehicle plant’s opening in St. Thomas despite concerns about the impact of tariffs. He said the employment announcement would help alleviate unease stemming from U.S. imposed levies.
“PowerCo has been out front saying this is still moving forward in a big way,” Preston said. “PowerCo is pretty happy in St. Thomas, and this shows that they continue to hire great professionals from across Canada and even around the world to work here in St. Thomas at this very large industrial facility.”
For those who are interested in applying for a position at PowerCo, visit http://powerco.ca and click “Join us.”
bwilliams@postmedia.com

author: Clayton Murphy | UM Community News Service
title: chevron-right
text:
HELENA, Mont. — It’s the final stretch for a bill that would fund increases to beginning teacher pay in Montana. Having passed the House and with one more vote left in the Senate, the Student and Teacher Advancement for Results and Success Act – the STARS Act – may soon become law.
School districts could then choose to dip into funds created by the act, yearly pools of up to about $350,000 depending on district enrollment.
Sen. John Fuller, R-Kalispell, is carrying the bill through the Senate and said during debate on the bill on Tuesday that it’s worth the price tag.
“Some of you may know that I'm so tight, I squeak when I walk, but I do support public education and I support it fiercely.”
To qualify for funding in the coming fiscal year, districts would have to pay educators a salary that is at least 62% of 2025’s average teacher pay.
Box Elder Democrat Sen. Jonathan Windy Boy agreed that $55 million in estimated yearly spending seemed steep, but it’s a step in the right direction.
“This is an issue that we have been looking at on the interim, sitting on the interim budget committee. And I think that the shortfalls that school districts across the state have been experiencing in this last interim. This will help. Probably [will] not make it whole, but at least put back some of the shortfalls that the school districts have been experiencing.”
The bill has been referred to the Senate Finance and Claims Committee where lawmakers will discuss how the bill impacts the state’s two-year budget.
Clayton Murphy is a reporter with the UM Legislative News Service, a partnership of the University of Montana School of Journalism, the Montana Broadcasters Association, the Montana Newspaper Association and the Greater Montana Foundation. Murphy can be reached at clayton.murphy@umconnect.umt.edu.

author: Ernesto Jiménez
title: Así es Tierra Caliente, la complicada región mexicana que busca controlar el CJNG
text:
La Sierra Madre del Sur marca el límite de una de las regiones más violentas del país,
Tierra Caliente: hogar de autodefensas, lugar de nacimiento de miles de desplazados a causa de la violencia y zona de disputa entre el Cártel Jalisco Nueva Generación (CJNG) y otros -cuando menos 10 grupos criminales- que se disputan el control territorial. [Te puede interesar: Así son los drones que usan Los Viagras contra sus rivales en Tierra Caliente](/mexico/2023/12/27/asi-son-los-drones-que-usan-los-viagras-contra-sus-rivales-en-tierra-caliente/)
Con un clima en verano que puede alcanzar temperaturas de hasta 50 grados centígrados -de ahí su nombre- , Tierra Caliente se desplaza al ritmo del Río Balsas por los estados de Michoacán, Guerrero y Estado de México (algunos estudios incluyen municipios de Colima y Jalisco) hasta las zonas boscosas donde ahora se siembra aguacate.
Debido al cause del Río Balsas y a las condiciones del terreno es una tierra fértil para la agricultura, práctica generalizada entre los pobladores que decidieron -o no pudieron escapar- resistir la violencia y quedarse en sus hogares a pesar de las constantes extorsiones y amenazas del crimen organizado. En 2022, sólo en la región de Michoacán, tres mil personas huyeron de Tierra Caliente, según datos del Informe de Derechos Humanos de EEUU.
[Te puede interesar: Vinculan a proceso a 9 presuntos integrantes de “Operativa Barredora” del CJNG en Puebla](/mexico/2023/12/26/vinculan-a-proceso-a-9-presuntos-integrantes-de-operativa-barredora-del-cjng-en-puebla/)
En las últimas dos décadas han aparecido diversos grupos criminales que protagonizaron diversos enfrentamientos contra pobladores y otros cárteles por el dominio de la región: La Familia Michoacana, Los Caballeros Templarios, el Cártel del Golfo, Los Zetas y el CJNG los de mayor fuerza.
Sin embargo, también se tiene identificada la presencia de grupo locales que se separaron de organizaciones más grandes o que nacieron de levantamientos armados para defenderse de otros grupos: los cárteles de Los Correa, Los Reyes, Zicuarán, Pueblos Unidos, Tepalcatepec, Los Ardillos, Los Rojos, Los Tlacos, Cárteles Unidos y La Nueva Empresa son sólo algunos ejemplos.
El CJNG por el dominio de Tierra Caliente
Tepalcatepec, municipio michoacano colindante con Jalisco, ardió esta semana a manos de ataques orquestados por presuntos integrantes del CJNG contra puestos de control de Cárteles Unidos; autos incendiados, bloqueos carreteros y balaceras provocaron el terror entre los habitantes de Tierra Caliente.
[Te puede interesar: Aseguran tigre y jaguar en inmueble del CJNG en Ixtlahuacán del Río, Jalisco](/mexico/2023/12/27/aseguran-tigre-y-jaguar-en-inmueble-del-cjng-en-ixtlahuacan-del-rio-jalisco/)
Pero los enfrentamientos de los hombres de “El Mencho” contra los grupos que defienden Tierra Caliente no son nuevos pues el
CJNG ha intentado en más de una ocasión ganar terreno en Michoacán y avanzar hacía los municipios que le garanticen el dominio de las rutas que conectan los puertos de Lázaro Cárdenas y Acapulco con el Estado de México y la Ciudad de México.
Por lo anterior, a mediados de 2023 hicieron circular un video en el que advertían su llegada a los municipios michoacanos de Nueva Italia, Huacana y Gabriel Zamora; el objetivo, “limpiar” la zona de Tierra Caliente con la presunta ayuda de Los Viagras.
Y es que después de la muerte de Hipólito Mora -el ex líder de las autodefensas en Michoacán- las organizaciones criminales que se aliaron para frenar el paso del CJNG por Tierra Caliente (Los Viagras, desertores de La Familia Michoacana y Caballeros Templarios) se separaron para un nuevo acomodo de los cárteles en la zona, según reportes de seguridad federal.
Se presume que algunas facciones de Los Viagras pactaron con “El Mencho” para ganar terreno en Tierra Caliente y quitarle el dominio a La Familia Michoacana, en la región de Guerrero y Estado de México, además de permitir la expansión de los de Jalisco por los municipios de Apatzingán, Tepalcatepec y La Huacana, entre otros.
Dominar Tierra Caliente para el CJNG representaría tener el control total de la ruta hacia Lázaro Cárdenas, el puerto por donde llegan la mayoría de los precursores químicos utilizados para la fabricación de drogas sintéticas; además de apoderarse de los negocios relacionados con extorsiones, cobro de piso y secuestro que los grupos locales han controlado por años para financiar sus operaciones y hacer frente al poder de “El Mencho”.

author: Yeni Şafak
title: Türkiye: 32 suspects, préparant des attentats contre des synagogues, des églises et l'ambassade d'Irak, arrêtés | Actualités Turquie
text:
Selon les informations reçues vendredi de sources de sécurité turques, le MIT a détecté que Mijbel Al-Shuveyhi (nom de code "Abu Yakin Al-Iraqi"), le soi-disant officier de renseignement de la structure turque de l'organisation terroriste Daech, et Muhammed Hilaf Ibrahim Ibrahim (nom de code "Abu Leys"), se préparaient à attaquer des synagogues et des églises en Türkiye, tandis que Iyheb Elani (nom de code "Abdullah Al-Jumaili") se préparait à attaquer l'ambassade d'Irak à Ankara.
DEAŞ Terör Örgütüne yönelik İstanbul merkezli 9️⃣ ilde düzenlenen “KAHRAMANLAR-37” Operasyonunda 2️⃣9️⃣ Şahıs Yakalandı❗
️
Terör Örgütleri ve onların İş Birlikçileriyle mücadelemiz kararlılıkla devam edecek❗
️
❌MİT Başkanlığı ile Emniyet Genel Müdürlüğü İstihbarat Başkanlığı ve… pic.twitter.com/xfu2gbrKT1
— Ali Yerlikaya (@AliYerlikaya) December 29, 2023 Publication du ministre de l'Intérieur turc, Ali Yerlikaya Les trois terroristes et 29 suspects identifiés comme leur étant liés ont été capturés lors d'une opération organisée à l'aube de vendredi dans neuf provinces du pays. De nombreux matériels numériques appartenant à l'organisation terroriste ont également été saisis au cours de l'opération.

author: @tendanceouest
title: Le Havre. Hébergement d'urgence : 50 places ouvertes en raison du froid
text:
Soixante-dix enfants dormiraient régulièrement à la rue, au Havre, selon le Réseau éducation sans frontières (RESF). [Ses bénévoles ont interpellé la Ville du Havre](https://www.tendanceouest.com/actualite-424622-le-havre-peluches-et-slogans-sur-le-marche-de-noel-ils-demandent-un-toit-pour-les-enfants-a-la-rue), mercredi 11 décembre, pour dénoncer cette situation, cette dernière rappelant que l'hébergement d'urgence est une compétence de l'Etat.
Davantage d'hébergements en cinq ans
Sollicitée par Tendance Ouest à la suite de cette manifestation, la préfecture de Seine-Maritime ne confirme pas le chiffre évoqué par RESF. Elle communique seulement un chiffre ponctuel, pour la soirée de mercredi : "Le 115 et le Service intégré d'accueil et d'orientation, les seuls services auxquels sont adressées les demandes d'hébergement sur un département, ont enregistré 12 enfants sur le territoire du Havre pour lesquels ils n'ont pas été en mesure de proposer un hébergement."
20 places en plus l'hiver pour les familles
Au total, au Havre, il existe 153 places d'hébergement, 177 en englobant les communes environnantes. "Ces capacités ont augmenté de 25% sur Le Havre comme sur le reste du département en cinq ans", affirment les services de l'Etat.
Depuis le 1er novembre, dans le cadre des dispositifs hivernaux, 20 places supplémentaires pour les familles ont été ouvertes au Havre, auprès de l'Association femmes et familles en difficulté (AFFD) et de l'Armée du Salut. Elles seront actives jusqu'à la fin de la trêve hivernale. La préfecture évoque par ailleurs l'existence d'accueils de jour, notamment celui de l'Armée du Salut, dédié aux personnes à la rue.
50 places pour le grand froid
Depuis jeudi 12 décembre "et jusqu'à la fin de la semaine" au moins, 50 places d'hébergement supplémentaires sont activées au gymnase Jacques Monod du Havre, en raison des températures en baisse. La préfecture indique également que les horaires d'ouverture des accueils de jour sont étendus et les maraudes renforcées. "Les enfants restés à la rue ces derniers jours doivent pouvoir être accueillis sur ces dispositifs pour les jours qui viennent", conclut-elle.

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Patriot Act with Hasan Minhaj Season 4 Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Netflix
text:
By Shayan John ,
1 hour ago Patriot Act with Hasan Minhaj Season 4 is a comedy talk show created by Hasan Minhaj and Prashanth Venkataramanujam. The show has experienced immense success not only in terms of viewership, but also in the form of an Emmy, two Webby Awards, and a Peabody Award.
Here’s how you can watch and stream Patriot Act with Hasan Minhaj Season 4 via streaming services such as Netflix.
Is Patriot Act with Hasan Minhaj Season 4 available to watch via streaming? Yes, Patriot Act with Hasan Minhaj Season 4 is available to watch via streaming on Netflix.
Hasan Minhaj has a unique, clever, and comical way of analyzing the political and cultural landscape of the country and the world. His take on the latest news is satirical and fresh, and distinctly unique from other talk shows.
Patriot Act with Hasan Minhaj is a one-man show that features the comedian in several segments, analyzing local and world news.
Watch Patriot Act with Hasan Minhaj Season 4 streaming via Netflix Patriot Act with Hasan Minhaj Season 4 is available to watch on Netflix. The most popular streaming platform is home to several interesting and engaging talk shows like My Next Guest Needs No Introduction with David Letterman, The Joel McHale Show with Joel McHale, Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee, The Break with Michelle Wolf, and several others.
You can watch via Netflix by following these steps:
Visit netflix.com/signup Choose a payment plan from the following: $6.99 per month (standard with Ads) $15.49 per month (Standard) $22.99 per month (Premium) Enter your email address and password to create an account Enter your chosen payment method The cheapest Netflix Standard with Ads Plan provides all but a few of its movies and TV shows. However, it will show ads before or during most of its content. You can watch in Full HD and on two supported devices at a time.
Its Standard Plan provides the same but is completely ad-free while also allowing users to download content on two supported devices with an additional option to add one extra member who doesn’t live in the same household.
The Premium Plan provides the same as above, though for four supported devices at a time, with content displaying in Ultra HD. Users get to download content on up to six supported devices at a time and have the option to add up to two extra members who don’t live in the same household. Netflix spatial audio is also supported.
Patriot Act with Hasan Minhaj’s synopsis is as follows:
“Every Sunday, Hasan Minhaj brings an incisive and nuanced perspective to global news, politics and culture in his unique comedy series.”
NOTE: The streaming services listed above are subject to change. The information provided was correct at the time of writing.
Expand All Read in NewsBreak

author: VNExplorer
title: Auschwitz survivor, 100, says a letter from King Charles made her feel 'very humbled' after a 'touching' personal gesture from the monarch
text:
Lily Ebert was sent a letter and flowers from the King to mark her 100th birthday
An Auschwitz survivor has described feeling ‘very humbled’ to receive a personal letter and flowers from the King to mark her 100th birthday.
Lily Ebert had expected to be sent the traditional congratulatory telegram from the monarch when she turned 100 today, but instead was surprised by the ‘touching’ personal gesture.
Since she was deported from her home in Hungary to the notorious Auschwitz-Birkenau death camp aged 20 in 1944 – where her mother, brother and sister were killed in the gas chambers – Ms Ebert has committed her life to raising awareness about the Holocaust.
She had made a promise to herself that she would ‘tell the world what had happened’ and her memoir, Lily’s Promise, became an international bestseller.
The King wrote the foreword to the book and decided to send a heartfelt personal message to Ms Ebert after being told of the milestone by her family.
Auschwitz survivor Lily Ebert has described feeling ‘very humbled’ to receive a personal letter and flowers from the King to mark her 100th birthday
Lily Ebert had expected to be sent the traditional congratulatory telegram from the monarch when she turned 100 today, but instead was surprised by the ‘touching’ personal gesture
The letter said: ‘Dear Lily, I particularly wanted to write a personal word on the very special occasion of your 100th birthday…
‘The terrible suffering which you and your family endured can never be adequately described or acknowledged, but as a survivor of the horrors of those years, your life’s work has been to remind our generation of the depths of depravity and evil to which humankind can descend, when reason, humanity and truth are abandoned.
‘By continuing to remind the world of the unimaginable atrocities which you witnessed, you have lived your life positively, with true nobility and without hatred, in a way that is an example to us all.
‘Your extraordinary strength of spirit, resilience and courage is admired more than I can possibly say.
‘I do hope that you have a very happy day in the company of your family and friends, and this brings you countless thoughts and blessings on such a memorable anniversary.’
The letter — signed by the King ‘with very special and warmest wishes’ — was also accompanied by a bouquet of flowers and the traditional 100th birthday telegram signed by the King and Queen.
Ms Ebert said: ‘I was surprised and very humbled when my great-grandson Dov informed me that the King had taken the time to write a personal and heartfelt letter for my 100th birthday.
‘Never in my wildest dreams did I imagine surviving Auschwitz, let alone starting a family and reaching the age of 100, only to be honoured in such a meaningful way.
Ms Ebert was deported from her home in Hungary to the notorious Auschwitz-Birkenau death camp aged 20 in 1944 – where her mother, brother and sister were killed in the gas chambers
‘The memories of my mother, youngest brother, and sister, who were murdered in the gas chambers of Auschwitz-Birkenau on July 9, 1944, weigh heavy on days like today.
‘Alongside 100 other members of my extended family, they were senselessly killed simply because of the religion they were born into.
‘Receiving this touching gesture from Their Majesties has deeply moved me.’
Ms Ebert met Charles, then Prince of Wales, at the Queen’s Gallery in London as portraits of herself and six other Holocaust survivors were unveiled in January 2022.
The paintings were commissioned by Charles as patron of the National Holocaust Memorial Day Trust.
She received an MBE for services to Holocaust education at Windsor Castle in January this year.

author: Newstral.com
